subject: Flight Delay Compensation Request
description: My flight PKA501 was delayed by 3 hours. I would like to request compensation as per your delay policy.

responses.message: Thank you for contacting us. I will review your delay compensation request and get back to you within 24 hours.

subject: Baggage Lost During Transit
description: I traveled on flight PKA101 from Tokyo to Seoul and my baggage did not arrive. Baggage tag number: PKA123456789. Please help me locate it.

responses.message: We are actively tracking your baggage. It appears to be at Seoul airport and will be delivered to your address within 24 hours.

subject: Seat Change Request
description: I have a booking on flight PKA301 and would like to change from a middle seat to an aisle seat. Booking reference: PKA789012.

responses.message: I have successfully changed your seat assignment to 12C (aisle seat). Your new boarding pass has been emailed to you.

subject: Refund Request for Cancelled Flight
description: My flight PKA999 was cancelled due to technical issues. I would like to request a full refund instead of rebooking. Booking reference: PKA456789.

subject: Special Meal Request
description: I have dietary restrictions and need a vegetarian meal for my upcoming flight PKA801. Can this be arranged?

responses.message: Your vegetarian meal request has been added to your booking. Please confirm at check-in that you still require this service.

subject: Website Login Issues
description: I cannot log into the website to check in for my flight. I keep getting an error message saying 'invalid credentials' even though I'm sure my password is correct.

responses.message: I've reset your password. Please check your email for the temporary password and update it after logging in.

subject: Group Booking Assistance
description: I need to book 15 seats for a corporate group traveling from Bangkok to Manila. Can someone assist me with group rates and seating arrangements?

subject: Wheelchair Assistance Request
description: I require wheelchair assistance for my elderly mother traveling on flight PKA701. She has mobility issues and will need help from check-in to boarding.

responses.message: Wheelchair assistance has been arranged for your mother. Please arrive at the airport 2 hours early and proceed to the special assistance counter.

subject: Frequent Flyer Points Missing
description: I completed a flight last week but the frequent flyer points haven't been credited to my account yet. Flight was PKA102 on January 4th.

responses.message: I'm reviewing your frequent flyer account. Points for recent flights can take up to 7 business days to appear. I'll expedite this for you.

subject: Pet Travel Information
description: I want to travel with my small dog on an upcoming flight. What are the requirements and additional fees for pet travel?
